thread.title: Ody Travel Gear™ Launches Premium Quality TSA Luggage Locks
thread.title_full: Ody Travel Gear™ Launches Premium Quality TSA Luggage Locks

author: prbuzz.com
title: Ody Travel Gear™ Launches Premium Quality TSA Luggage Locks
text:
July 8, 2015 - Florida, UK -- Ody Travel Gear ™ has found a solution for protecting travelers' luggage with their recently launched TSA accepted luggage locks in color black.
Most people are unaware that their bags are inspected and opened more frequently by security officers after check-in which can result in additional headaches for travelers.
Ody Travel Gear has launched new TSA accepted and Travel Sentry approved luggage locks in a 2-pack.
Of the millions of pieces of luggage that are screened every day in airports, a large percentage will be screened and opened by security for inspection. Bags and suitcases are typically forced open if travelers use non-TSA Approved locks. With TSA Accepted /Travel Sentry approved locks from Ody Travel Gear™, broken locks are a thing of the past.
Known by its distinctive red diamond logo, each lock has a special key, which is carefully distributed to the authorities and used by the TSA, CATSA, and other security agencies, to open and close the locks without damage.
These premium quality keyless locks are made with a tough and elegant zinc outer coating with a flexible, strong steel cable with a "U" clasp, and a 3-digit number combination for easy access. Travelers' luggage can now follow them safely to their destination, and individuals will have peace of mind knowing their lock is keeping their bags safe.
Ody Travel Gear™ takes pride in putting their focus on customer service and hopes each customer will enjoy their products for years to come. If at any time a customer is not satisfied with any part of their business, the company is keen to hear from them.
Available online from $21.95 and for a limited time, Ody Travel Gear ™ have included two eye catching Exclusive Luggage Labels with each twin pack lock purchase.
About Ody Travel Gear
Ody Travel Gear™ provides quality travel items for discerning travelers. All products come with lifetime warranties. The company is founded on an ethos of premium quality products backed up with world class customer service. Products are available to buy on Amazon.com or securely on their Website: Ody Travel Gear
